channel.title: Comments on: The Two-Hour Star Wars Holiday Special in only Five Minutes

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description: Agreed, that was horrible, but the Bea Arthur piece in the first song and dance number was pretty entertaining.
item.content:encoded: Agreed, that was horrible, but the Bea Arthur piece in the first song and dance number was pretty entertaining.

item.title: By: Algarve Portugal
item.dc:creator: Algarve Portugal
item.description: Funny stuff! I never saw the holiday special so thanks for this video... special effects and costume making have evolved a little bit in the movie industry :)
item.content:encoded: Funny stuff! I never saw the holiday special so thanks for this video… special effects and costume making have evolved a little bit in the movie industry üôÇ

item.title: By: Donncha O Caoimh
item.dc:creator: Donncha O Caoimh
item.description: I was going to blog this, then I watched it. Haha!
item.content:encoded: I was going to blog this, then I watched it. Haha!

item.title: By: Lloyd Budd
item.dc:creator: Lloyd Budd
item.description:
The Star Wars Holiday Special is famous for being bad.
I do remember enjoying The Ewok Adventure and the Ewoks: The Battle for Endor.
item.content:encoded:
The Star Wars Holiday Special is famous for being bad.

I do remember enjoying The Ewok Adventure and the Ewoks: The Battle for Endor.

item.title: By: Lloyd Budd
item.dc:creator: Lloyd Budd
item.description:
Ouch! I was too little to remember that.
I watched it earlier ... and now it is gone :(
item.content:encoded:
Ouch! I was too little to remember that.

I watched it earlier … and now it is gone üôÅ

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description: But the real question is, have you been able to sit through the whole thing again since it aired? :-)
item.content:encoded: But the real question is, have you been able to sit through the whole thing again since it aired? üôÇ

item.title: By: Adam Kalsey
item.dc:creator: Adam Kalsey
item.description: I have the whole special, commercials and all, on VHS.
item.content:encoded: I have the whole special, commercials and all, on VHS.
